h1Title: Premium 3-Bedroom Penthouse with Private Pool in Central Torrevieja
heroIntro: This exceptional 204m² penthouse in Torrevieja offers the ultimate Costa Blanca lifestyle with three generous bedrooms, three bathrooms, and your own private pool terrace. Located in the heart of this vibrant coastal city, you'll enjoy year-round Mediterranean living with easy access to pristine beaches, bustling markets, and excellent dining. The property features contemporary design throughout, with parking included for convenience. At €599,000, this represents outstanding value in one of the Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations, perfect for permanent residence or holiday investment.
propertyDescription: Spanning 204 square meters across the top floor, this penthouse maximizes space and natural light throughout. The open-plan living area flows seamlessly onto the private terrace, creating an ideal space for entertaining or relaxing. Three well-appointed bedrooms each feature built-in wardrobes and direct access to outdoor spaces, while three full bathrooms ensure comfort for family and guests. The master suite includes an en-suite bathroom and private terrace access. The modern kitchen comes fully equipped with quality appliances and granite worktops. Premium finishes include marble flooring, air conditioning throughout, and double-glazed windows. The crown jewel is the rooftop terrace with private pool, outdoor kitchen area, and 360-degree views over Torrevieja. Secure underground parking and storage room complete this exceptional property. The building features lift access and was constructed to high standards with quality materials throughout.

locationSection.title: Living in Torrevieja: Your Costa Blanca Lifestyle
locationSection.content: Torrevieja combines authentic Spanish culture with international appeal, making it the Costa Blanca's most dynamic coastal city. The famous salt lakes create a unique microclimate with healing properties, while the bustling Friday market brings fresh produce and local crafts to your doorstep. Year-round sunshine averaging 320 days annually makes outdoor living effortless. The city offers excellent healthcare facilities including the modern University Hospital, while the international community ensures English-speaking services. Transport links are superb with regular buses to Alicante and surrounding areas. The promenade stretches for miles, lined with palm trees and dotted with chiringuitos serving fresh seafood. Cultural events happen weekly, from summer concerts to traditional festivals, ensuring you're always part of the community.

investmentSection: Torrevieja's rental market thrives year-round thanks to its international appeal and excellent climate. Properties of this caliber typically achieve 6-8% gross rental yields, with peak season rates of €200-250 per night for short-term rentals. The city's popularity with Northern European buyers continues driving capital appreciation, with quality penthouses showing 4-6% annual growth over the past decade. The upcoming improvements to the N-332 highway and expanded bus services to Alicante Airport will further enhance accessibility and rental demand. Long-term rentals to the substantial expat community provide steady income at €1,200-1,500 monthly. The private pool and parking significantly increase rental premium compared to standard apartments.
lifestyleSection: Imagine starting each day with coffee on your private terrace, the Mediterranean sun warming your face as you plan another perfect Costa Blanca day. Walk to the bustling Friday market for fresh vegetables and local cheeses, then spend lazy afternoons by your rooftop pool with a good book. Evenings bring seaside dining at family-run restaurants where the paella is authentic and the welcome warm. Weekend trips to Alicante's cultural attractions or golf rounds at nearby championship courses add variety. The international community means bridge clubs, hiking groups, and English-language book clubs are always available. Your secure parking means easy exploration of hidden coastal villages, while the lift ensures shopping bags never feel heavy.

faqs.question: What are the monthly costs for this penthouse?
faqs.answer: Expect community fees around €150-200 monthly covering building maintenance, lift service, and common areas. Property tax (IBI) approximately €800 annually. Utilities vary by usage but typically €80-120 monthly including electricity, water, and internet.

faqs.question: How close is this property to Torrevieja's main beaches?
faqs.answer: Playa del Cura is just 800 meters away (10-minute walk), while the popular Playa de Los Locos is 1.2km. The scenic coastal path connects all beaches and is perfect for morning jogs or evening strolls.

faqs.question: Is financing available for international buyers?
faqs.answer: Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% for non-residents with competitive rates around 3-4%. You'll need Spanish bank account, proof of income, and deposit typically 30-40% of purchase price plus costs (approximately 10-12% additional).

faqs.question: Can I view this penthouse remotely or virtually?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive virtual tours via video call, detailed floor plans, and can arrange professional virtual reality viewings. However, we recommend physical viewing before final commitment given the €599,000 investment level.

faqs.question: What's the timeline from offer to completion?
faqs.answer: Typically 6-8 weeks in Spain. Process includes preliminary contract with 10% deposit, mortgage approval (if needed), final searches, and completion at notary office. We guide you through each step with English-speaking legal support.

faqs.question: What rental income can I expect from this property?
faqs.answer: Conservative estimates suggest €35,000-40,000 annual gross rental income through mix of holiday lets (€200-250/night peak season) and potential long-term rental at €1,200-1,500 monthly to expat professionals.

faqs.question: Are there restrictions on the private pool usage?
faqs.answer: The rooftop pool is exclusively yours with no community restrictions. Pool maintenance is your responsibility but typically costs €80-100 monthly for professional service including chemicals and cleaning.

faqs.question: What documentation do I need as an international buyer?
faqs.answer: You'll need NIE number (Spanish tax identification), passport, proof of funds for deposit and costs, income documentation for mortgage (if applicable), and Spanish bank account. We can arrange NIE appointment and recommend trusted legal advisors.
